amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent repeal of the CLASS Act from taking place if failure to implement the CLASS program would result in an increase in State and Federal Medicaid spending.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to propose adding a new section to prevent an increase in medicaid spending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 260 (Roll no. 15).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 260 (Roll no. 15).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Deutch.
